name: Chaos Game
desc: Place a series of N points. Draw a dot at a random place on the screen. Randomly chose a point and move the dot halfway to it, and then repeat forever. Depending on the number of points, different patterns will appear.

name: Cicle Filling Images
desc: Repeatedly spawn expanding circles on the screen that stop epanding when they touch another circle and have their colour set relative to a linked image.

name: Lissajous Curve Table
desc: A table with rotating cogs in the first row and column. The speed of the cogs increases going right/down. Horizontal and vertical lines are then drawn from a point on the cogs edge. Where these lines intersect a path is traced.

name: Matrix Rain
desc: The falling streams of symbols seen in the Matrix films.

name: Purple Rain
desc: My first project using p5. A simple rain simulation coloured purple, in reference to Prince.

name: Modulo Times Table Circle
desc: A cicle with numbers 0 to N-1 around the outside. Each number is then multiplied by a factor F modulo N, and a line is drawn from it to the result. The factor is then increased as time goes on.

name: Ray Casting
desc: A movable light source emitting rays in all directions. The rays end when they hit a wall.

name: Maurer Rose
desc: A set of points along rose curve connected with straight lines. Animated so that the set of points and number of rose petals changes over time.
